issue.title: [Python/Java] Spark integration tests do not work
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4108](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4108). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because some commands in spark_integration.sh fail Spark integration test on Docker container does not work.
